languages.text: "Столько добра на этих кляч изводят, а мы только и можем, что пояса затянуть..."
"All that food getting wasted on those wretched beasts while we're expected to just tighten our belts..."
languages.original_text: "Столько добра на этих кляч изводят, а мы только и можем, что пояса затянуть..."

traits.locale_text: "All the food wasted on those wretched beasts while we're supposed to just tighten our belts..."
"All the food wasted on those wretched beasts while we're supposed to just tighten our belts..."

"All that food getting wasted on those wretched beasts while we're expected to just tighten our belts..."

languages.text: 「あの食べ物が全部あの忌々しい獣どもに無駄にされて、こっちは腹をすかせて耐えろってか…」
languages.original_text: "All that food getting wasted on those wretched beasts while we're expected to just tighten our belts..."

traits.locale_text: 「あの食べ物が全部あの忌々しい獣どもに無駄にされて、こっちは腹をすかせて耐えろってか…」

languages.text: "O sefil yaratıklar için onca yemek ziyan oluyor, bizden de anca kemer sıkmamız bekleniyor."
languages.original_text: "All that food getting wasted on those wretched beasts while we're expected to just tighten our belts..."

traits.locale_text: "O sefil yaratıklar için onca yemek ziyan oluyor, bizden de anca kemer sıkmamız bekleniyor."

languages.text: «Toda esa comida malgastada en esas bestias mientras nosotros tenemos que apretarnos el cinturón...».
languages.original_text: "All that food getting wasted on those wretched beasts while we're expected to just tighten our belts..."

traits.locale_text: «Toda esa comida malgastada en esas bestias mientras nosotros tenemos que apretarnos el cinturón...».

languages.text: “那么多食物浪费在那些该死的畜生身上，可我们却只能勒紧裤带过日子……”
languages.original_text: "All that food getting wasted on those wretched beasts while we're expected to just tighten our belts..."

traits.locale_text: “那么多食物浪费在那些该死的畜生身上，可我们却只能勒紧裤带过日子……”

languages.text: « Tant de nourriture jetée en pâture à ces sales bêtes alors qu'on nous demande de nous serrer la ceinture... »
languages.original_text: "All that food getting wasted on those wretched beasts while we're expected to just tighten our belts..."

traits.locale_text: « Tant de nourriture jetée en pâture à ces sales bêtes alors qu'on nous demande de nous serrer la ceinture... »

languages.text: "All das Essen, das für diese verfluchten Biester vergeudet wird, während wir den Gürtel immer enger schnallen sollen ..."
languages.original_text: "All that food getting wasted on those wretched beasts while we're expected to just tighten our belts..."

traits.locale_text: "All das Essen, das für diese verfluchten Biester vergeudet wird, während wir den Gürtel immer enger schnallen sollen ..."
